verses.roman:
vārāṇasī-grāme yadi kolāhala haila
śuni' grāmī deśī loka āsite lāgila

synonyms: vārāṇasī-grāme—in the city of Vārāṇasī; yadi—when; kolāhala haila—there was broadcasting of this news; śuni'-hearing; grāmī—from the villages; deśī—from the towns; loka āsite lāgila—people began to pour in.
translation: After the news of these events was broadcast, everyone from the surrounding neighborhoods began to pour in to see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
